sentences.sentence: Duck! Duck! Be careful of this Pekinese!
sentences.translation: 鸭子！鸭子！小心这个北京人！

sentences.sentence: Japan's new government Poodle or Pekinese?
sentences.translation: 日本新政府到底是狮子狗还是京巴？

sentences.sentence: This city is nearby Beijing, so many Pekinese can go there on the weekend easily.
sentences.translation: 天津离北京很近，所以许多北京人在周末就可以轻而易举的到那里去。
